m_szDocTitle: Gov`t Calls on Auto Industry to Develop Electric Cars | Economy & Business | Tempo.Co :: Indonesian News Portal
m_szDocSumamry: Thursday, 25 February, 2016 |  09:22 WIB Gov`t Calls on Auto Industry to Develop Electric Cars Zoom Out Zoom In Normal TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Industry Ministry has called on the national automotive to develop electric cars, since the future trend is heading toward green concept. Electric cars development is one of government commitments to reduce emissions by 29 percent by 2030. “The opportunity to develop electric cars independently by the domestic industry remains open since there is no dominant player in the industry,” I Gusti Putu Suryawirawan, director general of metal, machinery, transp
